name: Prajna Yoga
description: The Art of Living Praj Yoga (Intuition Process) is a 2-day program introduced for kids and teenagers aged between 5-18 years.  We all are born with a natural intuitive ability to perceive beyond our senses. This is especially visible in children whose minds are still fresh, less obsessive and more in tune with nature.  The Art of Living Praj Yoga (Intuition Process) helps them tap into the intuitive abilities of the mind, which is demonstrated by them seeing colors, reading text and identifying pictures with their eyes closed.  Deep and enigmatic faculties are present in a latent form in every child. To make these faculties blossom and get more established, the mind needs proper nurturing and nourishment which is done in the Praj Yoga (Intuition Process).  The Praj Yoga (Intuition Process) app is a tool to assist the child with its practice following completion of the course.  Features include: - Practice Tracker - Statistics Overview (including Streak, Minutes & Sessions) - 40 Day Practice Challenge
